title: The Waiting Mortuary
description: For seventeen-year-old, Sebastian Trawler the summer is supposed to mean parties, sleep, and hitting the beach with friends, but when his parents start to suspect he's been lying about working at a local restaurant, he decides to take a real job that requires the least amount of effort. He finds it when he's hired to work for an eccentric mortician who believes the corpses are moving around at night.Watching dead bodies is supposed to be easy money but as Sebastian finds out there's no such thing.Horror and mystery meet in this fast-paced gruesome tale by L.V. Pires.
author: L.V. Pires
